```{r}
# Convert JSON to RDS
library(jsonlite)
data <- fromJSON("Data/individual_data.json")
saveRDS(data, "Data/ind_data.rds")
```

```{r}
individuals <- readRDS("Data/ind_data.rds")
library(tidyverse)
name = "Kelly"
bio <- as.character(individuals[trimws(individuals$name) == name, "biography"][1])
```
